Articles.Content: Nova recently released some information regarding all of the easter eggs in the game. I thought that this was too important to miss, but I will link to it to avoid spoiling for people who still want to wonder. link: http://pastebin.com/3vvjushy

That sounds pretty awesome. Why did Nova ever have to leave the dev team?

He seems to have a lot of cool ideas that could be implemented into the game.
